Accordion.Container.name: --accordion-item-palette-background-bold
Accordion.Container.description: Controls the default RGB color value used for border-color / color.

Accordion.Container.name: --accordion-item-gap
Accordion.Container.description: Controls the spacing gap between child elements, e.g. icons.

Accordion.Container.name: logic_name
Accordion.Container.description: Sets the form name attribute in a Svelte Context for child Accordion.Label buttons to group as.

Accordion.Container.name: logic_state
Accordion.Container.description: Controls the currently active Accordion.Label button via a Svelte Context.

Accordion.Group.name: logic_id
Accordion.Group.description: Sets the element id attribute in a Svelte Context for child Accordion.Group / Accordion.Label Components to group as.

Accordion.Section.name: loading
Accordion.Section.description: When the property is set and the Accordion.Section view is not active, the child content is not rendered to DOM.

Accordion.Label.name: close
Accordion.Label.description: Slot for rendering the content (usually an icon) shown when the Accordion.Section can be closed.

Accordion.Label.name: open
Accordion.Label.description: Slot for rendering the content (usually an icon) shown when the Accordion.Section can be opened.

<script>
    import {
        Accordion,
        Heading,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Accordion.Container logic_name="accordion-preview">
    <Accordion.Group logic_id="accordion-preview-1">
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section One

            <svelte:fragment slot="close">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▾

            </svelte:fragment>

            <svelte:fragment slot="open">

snippets.title: Accordion Loading

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Accordion,
        Heading,
        Text,
        Transition,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Accordion.Container
    logic_name="accordion-transitions"
>
    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-1"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section One

            <svelte:fragment slot="close">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▾
                </Text>
            </svelte:fragment>

            <svelte:fragment slot="open">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▸
                </Text>
            </svelte:fragment>
        </Accordion.Label>

        <Accordion.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Item One Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>

    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-2"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section Two

            <svelte:fragment slot="close">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▾
                </Text>
            </svelte:fragment>

            <svelte:fragment slot="open">

                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>

    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-3"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section Three

            <svelte:fragment slot="close">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▾
                </Text>
            </svelte:fragment>

            <svelte:fragment slot="open">
                <Text is="span">
                    ▸
                </Text>
            </svelte:fragment>
        </Accordion.Label>

        <Accordion.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Item Three Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>
</Accordion.Container>
snippets.title: Accordion Transitions

data.render:
Accordion

Accordion Components are typically used for displaying related content into collapsible stack of buttons, that toggles between views.

Imports

<script>
    import {Accordion} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const {Container, Label, Group, Section} =
        Accordion;
</script>

Inclusive

You can change the behavior of the Accordion to allow multiple items to be revealed at once via the behavior property.

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Accordion buttons via the palette property.

Loading

NOTE: Use the in-Browser developer tools to see this functionality in action.

You can customize the slot loading behavior of individual Accordion.Section Components to not render their children, via the loading property.

Transitions

You can use Transition Components to provide fancy switching animations.
